item.title: B69 Street Light Not Working, 29th December
item.description:
As with the multiple other failed light poles in this area, the LEDs appear to be very dimly lit but provide no illumination. Attaching two photos to demonstrate this. B69 asset code on the walkway. It does seem there are multiple failures in the vicinity; some proactive monitoring would be useful as there may be a systemic problem with these fittings?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Beadon Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned e-bike well over a year, 29th December
item.description:
E-bike needs moving. It has been here over a year and reported every time it is causing an obstruction, health and safety hazard and a danger. Many times we have had to tell children to get off and to stop playing around on it. There are also older boys/men that smoke around this bike in the basement and who burn paper etc. it is not safe left and chained up there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole not marked fir repair but others have been, 29th December
item.description:
There white lines round most of the pot holes on crab hill but the ones nearest the junction with ravensbourne avenue have been left out as has another just past Ravensbourne station as it goes uphill. Please do these too whilst you have all the workers and gear here to save having to come back again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crab Hill, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shopping trolly full of black sacks corner of meridian road, 29th December
item.description:
A shopping trolly and 5 black sacks have been dumped on the pavement. On the corner of meridian road just outside number 1. 2 bags are in the trolley and the rest are on the floor. These have now been ripped open by foxes. Please remove asap

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meridian Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet
